message.raw:
Moved daqmx reading to threads instead of gtk timeout callbacks. When they're doing nothing they're really doing nothing now, instead of while condition: pass or time.sleep or similar.

Appears to be working. Will now work on pushing the acquisition subprocess to being a subprocess of the hardware subprocess. But not to worry, the queues it will be writing into will go straight to the parent, without going through the process in the middle of the heirarchy.

message:
Moved daqmx reading to threads instead of gtk timeout callbacks. When they're doing nothing they're really doing nothing now, instead of while condition: pass or time.sleep or similar.

Appears to be working. Will now work on pushing the acquisition subprocess to being a subprocess of the hardware subprocess. But not to worry, the queues it will be writing into will go straight to the parent, without going through the process in the middle of the heirarchy.
